chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
C: Type
B: Type
A: Type
e: DT this W A
i: state
r2: cont A
r1: cont A

Goal:
r1 <== r2 -> verify i e r1 -> verify i e r2

Premises:
Inductive DT (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := with_spec : forall s : spec A, DTbin this W s -> DT this W A Arguments DT _ _ _%type_scope Arguments with_spec [this W] [A]%type_scope [s]
cont = fun A : Type => A -> state -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments cont _%type_scope
verify : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> DT this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
vrf_pre : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i i' : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> network_rely W this i i' -> verify i' e k
app_mono : forall x : ?A, monotone (@^~ x) where ?A : [this : nid W : world A : Type B : Type C : Type e : DT this W A i : state r1 : cont A r2 : cont A |- Type] ?T : [this : nid W : world A : Type B : Type C : Type e : DT this W A i : state r1 : cont A r2 : cont A |- poset]
vrf_coh : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r : A -> state -> Prop), (i \In Coh W -> verify i e r) -> verify i e r
vrf_post : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> verify i e (fun (x : A) (m : state) => forall m' : state, network_rely W this m m' -> k x m')
bind_rule : forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (q : cont A) (r : cont B), verify i e1 q -> (forall (y : A) (j : state), q y j -> j \In Coh W -> verify j (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
step : forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (r : cont B), verify i e1 (fun (y : A) (m : state) => verify m (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
call_rule' : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (i : state) (f : DT this W A) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> pre_of f i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), post_of f i x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i f k
do_has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s2 : spec A) (e : DT this W A), conseq e s2 -> do_prog e \In has_spec this W s2
call_rule : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : Pred state) (q : A -> Pred state) (i : state) (e : DHT[this,W](p,q)) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> p i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), q x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i (with_spec e) k
do' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s2 : spec A) (e : DT this W A), conseq e s2 -> DTbin this W s2
conseq_refl : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (this : nid) (e : DT this W A), conseq e (spec_of e)
aft_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> after i p P -> after i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ P v m)
binarify = fun (A : Type) (p : pre) (q : cont A) => (p, fun (i : state) (y : A) (m : state) => p i -> q y m) : forall A : Type, pre -> cont A -> spec A Arguments binarify {A}%type_scope
rely_loc' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (i j : state), network_rely w this i j -> getLocal this (getStatelet j l) = getLocal this (getStatelet i l)
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
Process.step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
bind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), DT this W A -> (A -> DT this W B) -> DT this W B
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
after : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
bind_s : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), DT this W A -> (A -> DT this W B) -> spec B
inject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type), injects V W K -> DT this V A -> DT this W A
safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
id_pf : forall (T : poset) (P : T) (i : ideal P), id_val i <== P
alw_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
alw_envs : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this W A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
DT_sind : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> SProp), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_rect : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Type), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
DT_rec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (P : DT this W A -> Set), (forall (s : spec A) (d : DTbin this W s), P (with_spec d)) -> forall d : DT this W A, P d
